summary: This series explores the concept and practice of ecosystem architecture. It examines decentralized, non-hierarchical structures inspired by diverse fields, aiming to create sustainable, regenerative systems from fragmented environments. A four-phase process is proposed for creating intentional communities with a balance of structure and creativity.
excerpt: This series delves into ecosystem architecture, emphasizing decentralization, non-hierarchical structures, and a four-phase process to build intentional communities. Inspired by diverse disciplines.
